programme.title: King of Karaoke: VS

programme.title: GBRB: Reap What You Sow
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote ‘FARM’ while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes on a cross-country road trip to help the Well Done Foundation. They work to find and cap some of the estimated two million leaking, toxic - potentially deadly abandoned oil and gas wells that are scattered throughout the U.S.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh comes down with the Boov Flu and Tip accidentally turns him into a flu monster Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles./Tip and Oh take off on a space road trip to see the Gorg Babies.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Sherman brings back a giant man baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC; Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Tuffnut goes undercover to help the gang rescue a Skrill captured by the Beserkers.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Accidental Hero In order to win the Fright Stuff Award, Casper consults his uncles for scaring advice. Rich Kid Ra When Ra pulls up to Scare School in a solid gold chariot, everyone suddenly wants to be his best friend.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Pawston’s annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and it’s Tag’s year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Scooch is bummed out because he’s missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When there’s a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, it’s up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they don’t have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Scooch is bummed out because he’s missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When there’s a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, it’s up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they don’t have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder after his girlfriend is killed in a tragic incident during their visit to the Middle East. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KABUKI KOOL
programme.desc: Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores the enduring appeal of two outlaws. Despite their crimes, they protect the weak and can be tender lovers.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nagasaka Mago makes art with discarded smartphones, computers, and other e-waste from the slums of Ghana, then uses much of the proceeds to give back to the community. He talks about his vision.

programme.title: JAPAN'S TOP INVENTIONS
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: smokeless grills.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Oka Yuki uses digital technology to make tough rehabilitation programs more enjoyable for children with disabilities. He shares his vision for combining medical/welfare services with entertainment.

programme.title: Hit the Road 5minutes Saitama
programme.desc: Let's take a drive in Saitama and discover its natural beauty and hidden gems. From Omiya, we head to Chichibu to see its famed SL train. En route, we savor local dishes and try washi paper crafting.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, two naginata (polearms) associated with legendary warriors: Benkei and Tomoe Gozen.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: The Great Race
programme.desc: It's edge-of-your-seat excitement as a high-speed transport boat departs for Edo carrying a rich cargo. Find out what's on the line for the stalwart crew as we break down their strategy.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Researchers pursue the mysteries of the sun in order to prevent damage to telecommunications equipment and potential space disasters caused by the magnetic storms following major solar flares.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Ashikari Seiya explores the potential of crickets as a nutritious solution to the global food crisis. He works with farmers in Cambodia to establish green, sustainable production methods.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Introducing asari, Japan's most popular clam. Visit Aichi to feast your eyes on asari dishes and see how they're cultivated using suspended cages. How about diving for some giant asari!?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: The popular Ebisu district developed alongside a brewery and even derives its name from beer. We trace the area's evolution, soak up its old-fashioned charm, and see what makes the community tick.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Introducing asari, Japan's most popular clam. Visit Aichi to feast your eyes on asari dishes and see how they're cultivated using suspended cages. How about diving for some giant asari!?

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Horses take center stage in the ancient capital's events, such as two May festivals--Aoi Matsuri boasting ornate historical attire and the 1,200-year-old Fujinomori-sai.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Maksym Haichenko has created a free Japanese language learning app for fellow Ukrainian evacuees at the Japanese IT company where he works. He talks about the development process.

programme.title: Hit the Road Chiba
programme.desc: Let's drive through Chiba Prefecture! We depart from Tokyo Station and enjoy magic hour at scenic Byobugaura. Along the way, encounter Chiba's traditions and be amazed by their artistic quality.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Izumi no Kami Kanesada, the much-loved sword of Hijikata Toshizo, the "Shogun's last samurai."

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Edo Aquatics
programme.desc: We go out onto a river where pleasure seekers take in an aquatics show. At first glance a display of rag-tag theatricality, the perform-ers are actually practicing a centuries-old form of swimming.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO

programme.title: Today's Close-Up

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Scholar Minakata Kumagusu made contributions to biology, folklore, and other fields. He laid the foundation for environmental conservation in Japan. We explore the environments that inspired his work.

programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned. The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them. The lighthouse light is broken; can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals! First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety. It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame. Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival. When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a solution.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuña who is missing her magic flute.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: On Ruby Day, Chef always celebrates the same traditions, including making a Ruby Tart. Chef and Olly want to make smoothies, but Henry won't let them inside the Stump!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Goldie becomes a psychic, Baby and William set out to make her predictions come true. Baby and William look after a baby reef rabbit and learn how difficult it is to be a parent.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: William hosts his very own TV show.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Luke Stars gets blown away in a giant tumbleweed, Digi and Tal make a duplicate which dances out of control.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen. Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen. Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. When Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long, Barbalala offers to help.

programme.title: Smallville S1 1
programme.desc: Teenager Clark Kent must cope with his emerging superpowers and his love for classmate Lana Lang. Clark befriends Lex Luthor and thwarts a vengeful former student.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 7
programme.desc: It's double the trouble when Sean auctions off two huge items, and two businesses in a box. Papa Bear follows a trail of ink, while T Money goes behind bars. And Mone goes all out to find out what's behind a mysterious red door. The answer may blow her mind.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 8
programme.desc: Jesse and Papa Bear team up to go after a barbed-wire-protected safe. It's a big day for Brandon and Lori - they score an awesome sand rail, and a vintage surfboard which turns out to be highly collectible.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Brace for impact - 20 of the world's dumbest adrenaline junkies are about to hit your screen! We've got a wannabe astronaut taking one giant leap off a roof, a girl who plays chicken with a bull, and a hot-air balloon wedding that hits the ground screaming. With spine-tingling commentary from our hilariously hardcore cast.

programme.title: Arrow S2 2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 12
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin discover the best ways to inflate a basketball, explore the birth of the fanny pack, and end up with a fruity explosion. Plus, Pitchman uncovers the best ways to unclog drains, pit cherries, and grate cheese.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 8
programme.desc: A dancing accountant takes on a bouncing boater and a shooter faces a man-child with moves.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 9
programme.desc: The new couple (aka the "younger, trendier Brandon and Lori") are back. Will it be "Out with the old, in with the new?"

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 10
programme.desc: Papa Bear sees a clue in a bin that leads him to believe there's a shotgun hidden in it. Lori teams up with Jesse behind Brandon's back to win the big specialty item at the end of the day. Brandon's anger turns to joy once it's revealed to be an antique fire engine.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.desc: When medicine for Glades Memorial Hospital is being hijacked by thieves, Oliver gets into a heated battle with China White and her new partner, the Bronze Tiger, over the supplies.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 91
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 103
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: The World - Episode 103
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 131
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 91
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - Boxing Day Tsunami
programme.desc: A massive earthquake below the Indian Ocean unleashed the deadliest tsunami in history, killing 230,000 people. Those who were swept up in the wave had no idea of its scale, only of the devastation that unfolded before them.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Alexandria, NSW
programme.desc: Young professionals Stuart and Monique Cormack are desperate to reinvent their tiny, neglected backyard. Will their big dreams fit their pint-sized, terrace garden?

programme.title: Four Corners - Trading In Chaos
programme.desc: We examine the chaos, confusion, uncertainty and fear generated by Trump's so-called reciprocal tariffs, which experts say will increase the cost of living, make the US poorer and the world a less prosperous and secure place.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 21
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 17
programme.desc: Bridget, James, Emma and the team chat with Killing Heidi's Ella and Jesse Hooper, world-renowned pianist Lang Lang, Movie news from Zak Hepburn plus pastry chef Christy Tania and winter tray bake ideas from Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: The World - Episode 103
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 132
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 132
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 132
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Make It My Own
programme.desc: Adam and his guests, performer Michelle Law and philanthropist Kon Karapanagiotidis, pay tribute to the recipes they've made their own.

programme.title: This Place - Gujiragun
programme.desc: Under the world's oldest picture garden in Broome, WA, sits a jila, or waterhole.Yawuru man Jimmy Edgar remembers the dream time stories of this important meeting place for people from many cultures over thousands of years.

programme.title: Project Wild - Cambodia
programme.desc: Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time she visits biodiversity-rich Cambodia.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 6
programme.desc: In nature, being flamboyant can mean anything form using extravagant behaviour to entice a mate or warn off predators - to camouflaging yourself when hunting. Standing out can be the ultimate strategy for survival.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bungle Bungles, Coranderrk, Cairns
programme.desc: Ernie experiences the breathtaking Bungle Bungles in the heart of the Kimberley, Narelda visits Coranderrk with a Wurundjeri elder and Aaron steps into the studio with didge-legend Dave Hudson.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - The Solomon Islands' SeaSistas
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Sur La Dalle
programme.desc: Inspector Adamsberg worked with Franck Mathieu in the past on a complex case involving a serial killer. When Mathieu contacted him about a strange murder in Louviec, Brittany, Adamsberg didn't hesitate to act. In the name of their friendship, he sets off with his team to help Mathieu.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: The Maison des Canuts traces the long tradition of Lyon's gold, silver and silk weavers. Each creation by visual artist Sarah Valente sounds like a call from the forest. Zomer is turning fashion upside down. In Brittany, craftsman Thibaut Thierry works paper with seaweed.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: The singer Phanee de Pool discovers life as a cat. Since time immemorial, they have lived alongside us yet, despite this proximity, they remain mysterious, untamed. Are cats really aloof, arrogant and immoral, more attached to a place than an owner? In fact, can you really ''own'' a cat?

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: The collections at the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum also include works by some of the greatest modern painters, such as: Monet, Morisot, Van Gogh, Gauguin, Derain, van Dongen, Cezanne, Braque, Kandinsky...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Au Pays Du Bonheur
programme.desc: Marc-Andre continues his quest in Copenhagen. He visits a children's day centre and joins in an empathy lesson at a primary school. He also discovers the beauty of design, through the architecture of the Playhouse and of Copenhill.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Château de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: Rendezvous in the centre of Liege to discover the transformation of two twin terraced houses. Plus a quirky weekend in France at the Gite du Sorcier in Colmar, marble in every shape and form and how to make up-cycled designer coat hooks.

programme.title: Meuh, L'epopee Des Cornes
programme.desc: Broad hooves, a smooth fatty skin, powerful body and resistant to disease: the Asian water buffalo is the king of the wetlands. Since its domestication around 5,000 years ago in Asia and on the Indian sub-continent, it has since made a place for itself on the other continents.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: Rendezvous in the centre of Liege to discover the transformation of two twin terraced houses. Plus a quirky weekend in France at the Gite du Sorcier in Colmar, marble in every shape and form and how to make up-cycled designer coat hooks.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobias falls into a trap: he thinks his parents are dead and witnesses Elisha's vertiginous fall into the void. Wiped out, he narrowly escapes Tomble's executioner, Tiger.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: Professor Didier Pittet spreads his wings and takes on life as a crow. Whether it's being a stool pigeon, a bird brain or a featherbrain: birds have the reputation of not being very bright. But all the scientific research shows quite the opposite, they are in fact formidably intelligent.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Arlette
programme.desc: Approached by Quebec's prime minister in the hope of bringing a younger look to his government, Arlette Saint-Amour, fashion magazine editor, is appointed minister of culture. Through her audacity and impeccable image management, she tries to make a place for herself in the world of politics.

programme.title: Les Fleurs Sauvages
programme.desc: Over a phone message, a man explains how to use his tractor so that the person on the other end can mow the lawn in his garden in his absence.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Marianne, Leon's mother has died. Now he has to move to Montreal to live with Francis, his biological father. Fortunately his grandfather Bernard will be at his side during this painful ordeal.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon visits his new secondary school to finalise his admission with the headmaster. Meanwhile Francis realises that he'll have to make some changes in the house to make life easier for Leon.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: It's Leon's first day at school! His French teacher is convinced he'll be an asset for the class. Leon meets Florence, a pupil suffering from cystic fibrosis.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Ricardo has to choose a member of his family who inspires him for a French project, which leads him to question his mother about his biological father. Leon learns a little more about the relationship between his parents.

programme.title: Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: Thanks to sculptor Vinciane Renard and Michelin-starred chef Sang Hoon Degeimbre, Adrien discovers nature as a cradle of artistic and culinary inspiration. Then it's Quentin Dujardin's turn to share his art, accompanied by his guitar.

programme.title: Diabolo Menthe
programme.desc: Paris, 1963. It's back to school for 13-year-old Anne and her sister Frederique, who is 15. In their all-girls secondary school, the teaching method remains very strict. In spite of the rules, Frederique is interested in boys and politics. Anne, for the moment, lives in her sister's shadow.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 27
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 42
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 9
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 2
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 7
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Encounter ep 21
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 19
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 12
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
